name: OOX: Place Bid
title: Place Bid on Auction
description: Place a bid on an active auction. Your bid must be higher than the current highest bid.

inputs.name: Auction ID
inputs.description: The ID of the auction to bid on.

inputs.name: NFT Type
inputs.description: The token identifier of the NFT being auctioned.

inputs.name: NFT Nonce
inputs.description: The nonce of the NFT being auctioned.

inputs.name: Bid Amount
inputs.description: Your bid amount in the accepted payment token.
